titles.title: What grace, O Lord, and beauty shone

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: What grace, O Lord, and beauty shone around Thy steps below! What patient love was seen in all Thy life and death of woe!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Forever on Thy burdened heart a weight of sorrow hung, yet no ungentle, murmuring word escaped Thy silent tongue.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Thy foes might hate, despise, revile, Thy friends unfaithful prove; unwearied in forgiveness still, Thy heart could only love

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O give us hearts to love like Thee!, like Thee, O Lord, to grieve far more for othersâ€™ sins than all the wrongs that we receive.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: One with Thyself, may every eye in us, Thy bretheren, see the gentleness and grace that spring from union, Lord, with Thee.
